moves.1. e4 e6 2. Bc4 c5 3. Nf3 Nc6 4. O-O d5: ? Rips open the centre while uncastled. My first mistake.
moves.5. exd5 exd5 6. Bb5 Bd6 7. Ba4: Touch move! This bishop move is meaningless, probably inaccurate. Kartic’s first mistake.
moves.7... Nf6: Preparing o-o, hoping Re1 doesn’t happen soon.
moves.8... O-O 9. c3: Huh, low on development and blocking the c3 square, perfect for the knight.
moves.10. Bc2: The meaning of c3 kind of becomes clear now.
moves.10... Bd7: Not trading my good bishop for his horrible one, but placing it on a worse square.
moves.11. Bd3: Dude, you need more development! 4 LSB moves!
moves.13. Ng5: ?? Asking for trouble. His 3rd mistake(2nd being moving his LSB too many times).
moves.13... h6 14. Nf3 Bb8: Preparing a simple checkmate along the h2-b8 diagonal.
